PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-17242011-12-20,  ,  ,  ,  DFAIT, 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
Subject** ANTI-DOPING CONVENTION ** Amendments to Annex I of the International Convention against Doping in Sport
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to accept, on behalf of the Government of Canada, the amendments to Annex I of the INTERNATIONAL CONVENTION AGAINST DOPING IN SPORT. The purpose of these amendments is to update the list of the Prohibited Substances under Annex I of the Convention.
AttachmentsAttachment
